page.title: 12Sway Recreation.
page.content: Sway has 1 church, St Lukes parish Church. The Church Rooms are used for various meetings, coffee mornings, Lunch Club etc. Sway Youth Centre was built after much fund-raising and is now used by Sway Youth Club, Girl Guides and a playgroup. The Boy Scouts have their own hut off Setthorns council Estate. Sway Village Hall was built in 1965 on land leased from the Sway Women's Institute, and is well used, e.g. by Drama Club, Badminton Clubs, Old Time Dance Club, Play Group, The Women's Institute, Parish Council Meetings, and of course let for jumble sales, wedding receptions, parties, whist drives, etc. Sway Working Men's Club has many members who enjoy snooker, skittles, and other activities.
